scripts.start: npm run replica && npm run deploy-local && npm run decl && cd frontend && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.create-canisters: dfx canister create main --no-wallet --identity default && dfx canister create assets --no-wallet --identity default
scripts.replica: dfx stop && dfx start --clean --background && npm run create-canisters
scripts.decl: npm run decl:cli && npm run decl:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:cli && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.deploy: dfx deploy backup --no-wallet --identity ${IDENTITY} --network ${NETWORK} --argument '(vec {principal "'$(dfx canister id main --network ${NETWORK})'"})' && dfx canister stop main --identity ${IDENTITY} --network ${NETWORK} && dfx deploy main --no-wallet --identity ${IDENTITY} --network ${NETWORK} && dfx canister start main --identity ${IDENTITY} --network ${NETWORK}
scripts.deploy-local: NODE_ENV=production IDENTITY=default NETWORK=local npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-staging: NODE_ENV=production IDENTITY=mops NETWORK=staging npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-ic: NODE_ENV=production IDENTITY=mops NETWORK=ic npm run deploy
scripts.postinstall: (cd frontend && npm install) && (cd cli && npm install)
